title: Early detection and spectral signature identification of tomato fungal diseases (Alternaria alternata, Alternaria solani, Botrytis cinerea, and Fusarium oxysporum) by RGB and hyperspectral image analysis and machine learning
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Seyed Mohamad Javidan, Ahmad Banakar, Keyvan Asefpour Vakilian, Yiannis Ampatzidis, Kamran Rahnama
